title: Project - To Do APP
name: To Do Application
about: A modern to do application where you can do all the basic operations. It comes with dark as well as light theme and you can change your preference accordingly.
about2: The functionality of this application are:
keyPoints: Change theme according to your preference

title: Project - Rock Paper Scissors Game
name: Rock Paper Scissors Game
about: This is a rock, paper, scissors, lizard, and spock game. You can play against computer. It has a modern neuromorphism UI and you can change your theme preference accordingly.
about2: The functionality of this application are:
keyPoints: Change theme according to your preference
LocalStorage feature for storing your score

title: Project - Portfolio Website
name: Portfolio Website
about: A modern portfolio website with all the basic sections, like about, skills, projects, and contact. It comes with dark and light theme and you can change your preference accordingly.
about2: The functionality of this website are:
keyPoints: Change theme according to your preference

title: Project - Library Management System
name: Library Management System
about: This is a library management system with a clean and modern UI and also has all the basic operations to manage a library. The functionalities include adding/removing the book, adding/removing students, issuing books, book reports, and book request information on the Admin side, and profile, book request, book report, etc on the student side.
about2: The functionality of this website are:
keyPoints: Separate dashboard for admin and student
It has every features required in a library
Focused mostly in clean UI for simplicity
